Question & Options:
Who composed the score for the 2015 movie 'The Martian'?
Options:
A. Hans Zimmer
B. John Williams
C. Harry Gregson-Williams
D. Danny Elfman

In the 2015 movie 'The Martian', which two songs are included in the exit music at the end of the film?
Options:
A. 'Stayin' Alive' and 'I Will Survive'
B. 'Bohemian Rhapsody' and 'Don't Stop Me Now'
C. 'Don't Leave Me This Way' and 'I Will Survive'
D. 'Imagine' and 'Let It Be'
Correct Answer: 'Don't Leave Me This Way' and 'I Will Survive'
